zh.title: 瑞波币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，待突破]
zh.content:
目前XRP/USD的价格处于1.58501附近，全天变化幅度较小，仅为0.15%。市场显现出震荡整理的趋势，价格在1.57961至1.5868区间内波动，未出现明显的突破。考虑到当前的短期价格波动，XRP/USD可能在等待市场的更明确信号。

技术指标方面，RSI（14）数据缺失，导致我们无法通过该指标判断超买或超卖状态。MACD当前值为-0.0452，显示出市场的卖压略强，但信号线未提供足够的确认。SMA(20)为1.67716，较当前价格存在较大差距，表明价格处于下行趋势中的低位，短期内仍有一定的反弹压力。

支撑位方面，1.57961一带对XRP/USD构成较强的支撑，价格若下破该区域，可能会进一步下探1.57附近。阻力位则位于1.5868附近，突破该位置后，可能会迎来更大的上行空间，接近SMA(20)的1.67716水平。

建议短线交易者在1.57961附近寻找买入机会，但要注意价格若未突破1.5868时仍可能继续整理。考虑到当前的震荡形态，长期持仓需谨慎，建议关注后续技术指标的进一步确认。

en.title: Ripple vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
XRP/USD is consolidating near 1.585 after a modest 0.15% daily gain, but the broader short-term structure remains pressured. Price is trading well below the 20-day SMA at 1.677, signaling that recent rallies have struggled to regain control. The tight 24-hour range (1.5868 high vs 1.5796 low) reflects reduced momentum and a market waiting for direction, with sellers still defending higher levels.

With RSI(14) unavailable, momentum must be inferred from price behavior and MACD positioning. The MACD value at -0.0452 sits in bearish territory, implying downside momentum is still present even if it has softened. If the MACD begins to rise toward the zero line, it would suggest weakening bearish pressure and an early shift toward stabilization. Until then, bounces may remain corrective rather than the start of a sustained uptrend.

Key support is clustered around 1.580–1.575, where buyers have recently defended the intraday low zone. A clean break below 1.575 could open the door toward 1.550 and potentially 1.500 if selling accelerates. On the upside, immediate resistance sits at 1.587–1.595, followed by a more meaningful barrier near 1.620–1.635. The major resistance remains the 20-day SMA region around 1.677, which would likely attract heavy supply on a retest.

For trading, conservative participants may wait for a confirmed reclaim above 1.620 with follow-through before targeting 1.650–1.677. Aggressive dip-buyers could consider entries near 1.580 support, but should keep tight risk controls below 1.570 to avoid breakdown risk. Short setups are more favorable on failed rallies into 1.620–1.635, especially if price rejects quickly. Overall, bias stays cautiously bearish until XRP closes back above the 20-day average.
